name: raycast-context-bridge
description: Educational reconstruction of the Raycast Companion extension

scripts.firefox:zip: npm run build && web-ext build --config-discovery=false --config ./web-ext.firefox.config.cjs --filename raycast-companion-firefox.zip
scripts.proxy:build: mkdir -p dist && cd proxy && go build -o ../dist/raycast-proxy ./cmd/raycast-proxy
